This will dump the entire database to the SD card using the file name you enter below, automatically adding a timestamp and the suffix .sqlite, do you wish to proceed?
This will close the application. If background scanning was enabled, it will be stopped as well. Do you really wish to leave?
List of recently discovered unique bluetooth devices in decending order of their number of total occurences.
List of unique bluetooth devices discovered during session #%d in decending order of their number of total occurences.
List of recently conducted bluetooth sessions with the most recent ones on top.
List of bluetooth sessions containing device address [%s] with the most recent sessions ones on top.
List of recently recorded bluetooth sightings in chronological order.
List of recorded bluetooth sightings during session #%d in chronological order.
List of recently recorded sightings of bluetooth device address [%s] in chronological order.
list all sightings of this device
list the sessions containing this device
list the devices found during this session
show the sightings from this session
list sessions with sightings of this device
list other sightings of this device
Choose a new time and date to set system wide. This will update all time related database columns. Sadly, this app cannot change the system clock, so you will have to do that yourself.
%s milliseconds will be added to all time columns.
